RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Pуs-doutorado - Departamento de Fisica, Universidade Federal do Maranhгo, Sгo Luнs, Brasil. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Astronomia, com кnfase em: binбria de raios X, estrelas variбveis, pulsares, gravitaзгo, timing analysis, fotometria.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: master's at Astronomy from Department of Astronomy of Padova (2006) and doctorate at School of Doctorate in Astronomy from Department of Astronomy of Padova/INAF-Astronomical Observatory of Padova (2010). Has experience in Astronomy, focusing on Astronomy, acting on the following subjects: instrumentation: photometers, accretion disks, black hole physics, ground-based ultraviolet, optical and infrared tel and general laser theory.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Scientific topic (1) High frequency time variability models (2) Energy and power spectrum analysis of X-ray binaries (3) Orbital motions in General Relativity (4) Correlation functions and degree of coherence of light (5) Timing analysis of the Crab pulsar profile (6) Metal-rich white dwarfs (7) Symbiotic stars (8) Variable stars (9) Photometry and spectroscopy --------------------------------------------------------------------
Programming and data analysis (1) Python (good) (2) Xronos (good) IRAF (good) (3) Mathematica (good) (4h) Tempo2 (good) (5) Knowledge of C++ (5) Knowledge of Maple (7) Knowledge of Matlab
